Message: I dont feel like training today, I am sorry.

It's alright to have off days, but remember, every effort brings you closer to your goals. Take a breather now, and we can pick up where we left off tomorrow with renewed energy. I'll be here for you when the time comes.
I am so busy today, I dont have any time today and I have not eaten breakfast yet.

Your well-being matters too. Perhaps pushing physical training to later in the day or rescheduling might help. Don't forget to take care of essential needs first. We can adapt to find a suitable routine that works for you.
I lost my training shoes yesterday and all clothing stores are closed today, so I cant buy new ones.

Setbacks happen, but don't let them discourage you. Focus on what you can control. Tomorrow, we'll work out a plan to get you back on track with proper gear. In the meantime, stretching or alternative exercises may keep your routine going. Let's make the most of the
